structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.text: All equipment shall be installed and maintained in a safe operating condition and in conformity with the rules and regulations of the division adopted under KRS 250.483.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 56. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 3, effective June 19, 1958.
